title: Debuggy
description: Application for enable android debug bride over network with some additional features.

sections.title: About Debuggy
sections.description: The Debuggy’s app provides to rooted user easy tool to enable ADB over network with just a few clicks, and have some advanced tools like enable ADB after device start, custom port etc.

sections.title: Visual theme
sections.description: Debuggy’s follow Material You guidelines, like Android 12 components, it have round corners - a visual theme in application that is used in various components and elements. They reflect the shape of the logo.

sections.title: Interaction
sections.description: Interaction with the infomation occurs through overlapping sheets that provide all the information and actions you need.

sections.title: Architecture
sections.description: The Debuggy’s application architecture has a list structure like setting app. The lists contains settings and useful information for user.

sections.title: Layout
sections.description: Debuggy’s use setting-like structure for content with group by headers.

sections.title: Color
sections.description: Debuggy’s color palette based on system color engine introdused on android 12, for older versions it use generated paleltte based on Material You token seed.

sections.title: Iconography
sections.description: Debuggy’s uses Material Design’s and round iconography system. These icons are constructed to remain legible and clear at small sizes.

sections.title: Shape
sections.description: Debuggy’s uses round shape for Small, Medium and Large components.

sections.title: Motion
sections.description: Debuggy’s motion design uses shared axis motion for navigation between fragments.
